name: Tengoku 1.5: 聖歴史 〜 Tome of Ancestral Vision
name_original: Tengoku 1.5: 聖歴史 〜 Tome of Ancestral Vision
description:
Tengoku Seirekishi (Holy History)

"The history test is coming up, and I know almost nothing... and they are expecting a high grade from me as usual..."

After having saved the world, magical girl Angelica lives out her daily life as a student. Unfortunately, she's not at all prepared for the upcoming test and visits the school library as a last resort. However, she learns more than she could possibly imagine...

A danmaku/bullet hell game featuring magical girls and two different stories to follow!

Controls MoveArrow keys
JumpTap Z or spacebar
FlyHold Z or spacebar
ShootXBombCPausePToggle fullscreenAlt + Enter Gameplay

You control Gabriella, an angel whose mission is to protect heaven from outside threats. Use your magic to defeat the enemy, while dodging a barrage of bullets. Hitting bosses with your arrows will make them drop Energy that power up your arsenal, as well as all important point items. Prove yourself against three different foes!

Hints
  • Use bombs
  • You have to land in between  flying to recover your stamina. Be careful when touching down!
  • If a boss is too hard, you can use continues. These unlock after enough deaths to a boss.
  • The less hits you take, the higher your grade!
Credits
  • Dogtopius: Programming, Art, Design, Concept
  • lapspider45: Music, Background art, Testing
SFX sources

All sounds have been slightly edited.

  • Cannon Shot by qubodup (CC0)
